mapper.update: update t_attach set fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftype = #{ftype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creatorId = #{creatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fkey = #{fkey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fname, ftype, creatorId, createTime, fkey from t_attach
